department: Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada
description: * Human resources consulting service * Task Based Professional Services (TSPS) Requirement
full_summary:
**PROGRAM REVIEW OF IRO FUNDING**
======================================================

**Revised Tender Notice**
-------------------------

**Solicitation Number:** 1000251832
**Description:** The Department of Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS).

**Background:**
The Department requires a program review to generate recommendations on how to improve and better align three contribution authorities (BOC, FICP, and C&PD). The review aims to reduce overlap and clarify policy objectives and outcomes.

**Scope of Work:**
The RFP seeks the services of a TSPS provider to lead the program review, which includes:

* Needs analysis and research
* Statistical analysis
* Facilitation
* Project management

**Security Requirements:**
The contract requires a minimum security level of Protected B for the company and resources. Document safeguarding must be maintained at the Protected B level as well.

**Trade Agreements:**
The Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) applies to this RFP.

**Anticipated Contract Value:**
The contract value for the services required is expected to be determined based on the bidder's pricing schedule.

**Timeline:**
The contract is expected to commence on November 20, 2023, and end on December 31, 2024.

**Eligibility:**
Eligible bidders must hold a Supply Arrangement under E60ZT-18TSPS and have qualified for Tier 1 in the stated consultant category.

**Contact Information:**
For further information, please contact Jean Damascene Gasake at jeandamascene.gasake@sac-isc.gc.ca or (873) 354-5730.

**Proposal Submission:**
Prospective bidders must submit their proposals by November 13, 2023, at 14:00 EST to be considered for this RFP. Only eligible suppliers will be invited to submit a proposal.

Please note that the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method of supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. For information on how to become a "Qualified SA Holder," please contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA.
